snippet.title: Tales of Graces - English Opening
snippet.description:
EDIT: 2/2/2011: TALES OF GRACES F COMING OUT IN NORTH AMERICA: http://ataleoftworichards.com/

I won't remove the Echo version, but this is the unedited version of the presumed English opening.

I do not hold the copyrights for the song or the game displayed in this video. All content belongs to the Avex Group Holdings Inc. and Namco Bandai Holdings Inc.. This video is for viewing purposes only. This video's audio should remain because of the Fair Use trademark law of the U.S.
